oai_dc:dc.dc:title: QUANTICOL - Dissemination plan for the project
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gilmore, Stephen
Ter Beek, Maurice H.
Bortolussi, Luca
Ciancia, Vincenzo
Galpin, Vashti
Hillston, Jane
Massink, Mieke
Tribastone, Mirco
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dissemination
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/D.2 SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This document sets out the dissemination plan for the QUANTICOL project. The project has ambitions to see its research outputs and results disseminated widely in academia and beyond. We present here our plan to achieve this goal and review the progress on the plan which has been achieved in the rst year of the project. This gives an insight into how we see the plan being developed and implemented in later years of the project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: info:eu-repo/grantAgreement/EC/FP7/600708/EU/A Quantitative Approach to Management and Design of Collective and Adaptive Behaviours/QUANTICOL
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: QUANTICOL: A Quantitative Approach to Management and Design of Collective and Adaptive Behaviours. Deliverable D6.1, 2014.
